name: Garuda Scheme for Funeral Expenses
description: The Garuda Scheme is a welfare initiative by the Government of Andhra     Pradesh to provide financial assistance for funeral expenses to eligible families, especially from the Brahmin community. The scheme helps reduce the financial burden on families during the time of death of a family member.
apply_steps: Visit the official Andhra Pradesh Brahmin Welfare Corporation website
Login using your registered mobile number or credentials
Select the Garuda Scheme for Funeral Expenses option
Fill in the application form with deceased person and applicant details
Track application status through the portal
Receive financial assistance after verification and approval

name: Kalyanamastu Pathakam Scheme
description: The Kalyanamastu Pathakam Scheme is a welfare initiative by the Government of Andhra Pradesh that provides financial assistance for the marriage of eligible girls from economically weaker sections, especially from the Brahmin community.
apply_steps: Visit the official Andhra Pradesh Brahmin Welfare Corporation website
Login using your registered mobile number
Select the Kalyanamastu Pathakam Scheme option
Fill in applicant and bride details
Track application status through the portal
Receive financial assistance after verification and approval

name: Sanction of Laptops – Andhra Pradesh
description: This scheme provides free laptops to eligible students to support their education, digital learning, and academic development.
apply_steps: Select the Sanction of Laptops option
Fill in student and academic details

name: Sanction of Adult Sticks to Senior Citizens
description: The 'Sanction of Adult Sticks to Senior Citizens' scheme aims to provide walking sticks to senior citizens to support their mobility and daily activities. The scheme is implemented by the A.P. Differently Abled & Senior Citizens Assistance Corporation under the Action Plan 2017–18. Distribution is carried out by the Assistant Directors, Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled & Senior Citizens, and District Managers of the Corporation.
benefits: Provision of walking sticks to senior citizens
Support for mobility and independent movement
Improved accessibility and daily living support
apply_steps: Click on 'APDASCAC Schemes' on the homepage
Select the 'SANCTION OF ADULT STICKS' option
Fill in the required personal and eligibility details
Receive the walking stick after approval
documents_required: Latest Income Certificate or BPL Ration Card

name: INDIRAMMA Widow Pension (Rural)
description: Monthly pension scheme for widows residing in rural areas of Andhra Pradesh.

name: Sanctioning Spectacles to Senior Citizens
description: This scheme provides free spectacles to senior citizens suffering from vision problems to support better eyesight and daily functioning.
apply_steps: Fill in age and vision details

name: Sanctioning of Tricycles to Orthopedically Challenged
description: This scheme provides tricycles to orthopedically challenged persons to improve mobility and quality of life.
apply_steps: Fill in disability and personal details

name: Sanction of Motorized Three Wheeler to Orthopedically Challenged
description: Motorized three-wheelers provided to orthopedically challenged individuals for mobility.

name: Bharati Scheme for Education - Graduation
description: Educational assistance for graduation students from eligible communities.

name: Bharati Scheme for Education - 1st Class to 5th Class
description: This scheme provides financial assistance to eligible Brahmin students studying from 1st class to 5th class to support their early education.
apply_steps: Visit the Andhra Pradesh Brahmin Welfare Corporation website
Select Bharati Scheme for 1st to 5th Class
Fill in student and school details

description: This scheme provides financial rewards to meritorious Brahmin students for outstanding academic performance.

description: This scheme provides daisy players to visually challenged persons to support learning and accessibility.

description: This scheme provides scholarships to children of registered Building and Other Construction (BOC) workers to support their education.

name: Vocational Training to the Dependents
description: This scheme provides vocational training to dependents of registered workers to enhance employability and skills.

Collect the vocational training application form

name: 15 Days Skill Up‑gradation Training
description: This scheme offers short‑term 15‑day skill up‑gradation training to improve employability.

description: This scheme supports unemployed youth to become transport operators through financial assistance.

name: Employee Health Scheme (EHS)
description: Cashless medical treatment scheme for Andhra Pradesh government employees and pensioners.

name: Pedalandariki Illu

name: Mukhyamantri Prakhand Parivahan Yojana
description: This scheme aims to provide financial assistance to eligible beneficiaries for purchasing vehicles to improve self-employment opportunities and strengthen rural and block-level transportation services in Bihar.
apply_steps: Visit the official Transport Department website of Bihar

name: Financial Assistance for Marriage (BBOCWWB)
description: This scheme provides financial assistance to registered construction workers (male or female) under the Bihar Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board for the marriage of their adult daughter or the female worker herself.
apply_steps: Visit the official website of the Bihar Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board
Complete worker registration if not already registered
Select the Financial Assistance for Marriage (BBOCWWB) scheme
documents_required: Passport size photograph of the applicant
Passport size photograph of the daughter / bride
Proof of age of daughter / bride
Marriage proof (invitation card / certificate issued by registrar etc.)
Bank Account details / copy of bank passbook

name: Bihar Student Credit Card Scheme
description: Financial assistance scheme by the Government of Bihar to help students pursue higher education by providing education loans up to ₹4 lakh.
apply_steps: Select Bihar Student Credit Card Scheme
documents_required: Identity proof (Passport, Driving License, Voter ID)

name: Disability Pension (BBOCWWB)
description: Financial assistance scheme by the Bihar Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board for registered construction workers suffering from permanent or partial disability.
apply_steps: Login using Aadhaar and registration details
documents_required: Disability certificate issued by Civil Surgeon / Chief Medical Officer

name: Pension Scheme (BBOCWWB)
description: Monthly pension scheme for registered construction workers of Bihar who have completed minimum five years of membership and attained the age of 60 years.
apply_steps: Login using Aadhaar and registration details
documents_required: Proof of five years of membership

name: Mukhyamantri Divyangjan Sashaktikaran Chhatra Yojana
description: Scheme to provide free battery-operated tricycles to eligible divyang (locomotor disabled) students or employees in Bihar to improve mobility and independence.
documents_required: College / university ID card or employment proof

name: Chief Minister BC & EBC Chhatrawas Anudan Yojana
description: Financial assistance scheme for BC and EBC students residing in government hostels in Bihar to cover essential living expenses.
apply_steps: Login using user ID and password

name: Mukhyamantri Vridhjan Pension Yojana
description: Old-age pension scheme of the Bihar Government providing monthly financial assistance to senior citizens aged 60 years and above.
apply_steps: Fill personal, address and bank details

name: Mukhyamantri Kanya Suraksha Yojana
description: Scheme to provide financial security to girl children from BPL families in Bihar by investing a fixed deposit in their name.
apply_steps: Obtain application form from WCD office
Fill the form with correct details
Submit the form to the concerned office
Documents will be verified and beneficiaries informed
documents_required: Birth certificate of the girl child

name: Niji Talabon Ka Jirnoddhar Ki Yojana
description: Scheme of the Bihar Fisheries Department to support renovation and restoration of privately owned ponds to promote fisheries development and increase fish production.
apply_steps: Visit the official Fisheries Department website
Download and fill the application form
Submit the application to the concerned fisheries office
Approval and release of financial assistance
documents_required: Aadhaar Card / Ration Card / Voter ID Card
Clear photograph of the proposed pond with a distinguishable landmark
Land ownership certificate or lease agreement (minimum 9 years for leased land)
Bank account number, branch, IFSC code details
Caste certificate (for SC / ST / EBC, if applicable)
Affidavit stating that the pond has not been renovated under any government scheme in the last five years
Affidavit for ponds damaged by natural disasters (if applicable)
Lease agreement on ₹1000 non-judicial stamp (for leased ponds)
Land map of the pond area

name: Makhana Vikas Yojana
description: Scheme launched by the Department of Agriculture, Bihar to enhance Makhana cultivation and productivity by providing training, equipment kits and financial assistance to farmers.
apply_steps: Register using Aadhaar and mobile number
Note the application number for tracking

name: Bihar Rajya Fasal Sahayata Yojana
description: Crop assistance scheme of the Government of Bihar to provide financial compensation to farmers in case of crop damage due to natural calamities such as flood, drought or hailstorm.

name: Makhana Beej Vitaran
description: Scheme of the Department of Agriculture, Bihar to provide quality makhana seeds to farmers to promote makhana cultivation and improve productivity.
apply_steps: Register using Aadhaar and mobile number
Note the application number for future reference
documents_required: Genealogy (if applicant name not clear in land records)

name: Mushroom Kit Vitaran
description: Scheme launched by the Department of Agriculture, Bihar to encourage mushroom cultivation by providing subsidized mushroom kits and training to farmers.

Note the application number for reference

name: Beej Masaale Ki Yojana
description: Scheme of the Department of Agriculture, Bihar to promote cultivation of identified seed spices by providing financial assistance and access to quality seeds.

name: Pashu Bima Yojana
description: Livestock insurance scheme of the Government of Bihar to provide financial protection to dairy farmers against death of insured milch cattle.

name: Chief Minister EBC Civil Seva Protsahan Yojana
